title: What is the Shanghai tennis schedule?
description: Novak Djokovic will continue his bid for his 100th tour-level title on Friday at the Rolex Shanghai Masters. The record-four-time champion at the Chinese ATP Masters 1000 takes on #NextGenATP Czech Jakub Mensik in the night session quarter-final inside Qizhong Forest Sports City Arena. Djokovic and Mensik’s maiden Lexus ATP Head2Head clash follows a last-eight encounter between seventh seed Taylor Fritz and David Goffin. View the full Thursday order of play below to see who is competing, on which court, and when they are scheduled. [ATP APP] ORDER OF PLAY - FRIDAY, 11 OCTOBER 2024 STADIUM COURT start 12:30 pm Santiago Gonzalez (MEX) / Edouard Roger-Vasselin (FRA) vs Wesley Koolhof (NED) / Nikola Mektic (CRO) Not Before 3:00 pm [7] Taylor Fritz (USA) vs David Goffin (BEL) Not Before 6:30 pm Jakub Mensik (CZE) vs [4] Novak Djokovic (SRB) Roger & Friends Celebrity Doubles R. Federer/E. Chan - Z. Zhang/Z. Fan [NEWSLETTER FORM]

html:
Shanghai

Fritz vs. Goffin, Djokovic vs. Mensik in quarter-finals

October 10, 2024

AFP/Getty Images

The Rolex Shanghai Masters is the eighth ATP Masters 1000 event of the season. By ATP Staff

Novak Djokovic will continue his bid for his 100th tour-level title on Friday at the Rolex Shanghai Masters. The record-four-time champion at the Chinese ATP Masters 1000 takes on #NextGenATP Czech Jakub Mensik in the night session quarter-final inside Qizhong Forest Sports City Arena.

Djokovic and Mensik’s maiden Lexus ATP Head2Head clash follows a last-eight encounter between seventh seed Taylor Fritz and David Goffin.

View the full Thursday order of play below to see who is competing, on which court, and when they are scheduled.

ORDER OF PLAY - FRIDAY, 11 OCTOBER 2024

STADIUM COURT start 12:30 pm
Santiago Gonzalez (MEX) / Edouard Roger-Vasselin (FRA) vs Wesley Koolhof (NED) / Nikola Mektic (CRO)

Not Before 3:00 pm
[7] Taylor Fritz (USA) vs David Goffin (BEL)

Not Before 6:30 pm
Jakub Mensik (CZE) vs [4] Novak Djokovic (SRB)
Roger & Friends Celebrity Doubles R. Federer/E. Chan - Z. Zhang/Z. Fan
